edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram
Interface BackoffLanguageModel

All Superinterfaces:
Configurable, LanguageModel
All Known Implementing Classes:
LargeNGramModel, LargeTrigramModel, SimpleNGramModel
public interface BackoffLanguageModel
extends LanguageModel

Represents the generic interface to an N-Gram language model that uses backoff to estimate unseen probabilities. Backoff depth is important in search space optimization, for example it's used in LexTreeLinguist to collapse states which has only unigram backoff. This ways unlikely sequences are penalized.
